cases.title: Item sorting
cases.description: User can sort items by: name, price, popularity and date
cases.preconditions:

Items sorted by price by defaut

suites.title: Authorization
suites.description: This suite contains cases that belong to the following processes: login, signup, password restore, remember me option.

cases.title: Sign up with empty fields validation
cases.description: We can Sign up on page [https://litecart.stqa.ru/en/create_account](https://litecart.stqa.ru/en/create_account)

steps.expected_result: Black border around "First Name" field and hint "Fill in this field" is displayed

cases.title: Sign up
cases.description: Sign up with only required fields

steps.expected_result:
Form with fields:

* Tax ID
* Company
* First Name\*
* Last Name\*
* Address 1\*
* Address 2
* Postcode\*
* City\*
* Country\* dropdown
* Email\*
* Phone\*
* Desired Password\*
* Confirm Password\*
* "Newsletter" checkbox
    Fields with "\*" are required to fill in
Data is displayed in "First Name\*" field
Data is displayed in "Last Name\*" field
Data is displayed in "Country\*" field. Hint "+128" in "Phone\*" field is diplayed.

steps.action:
Fill in "Email\*" field
(used temporary email address created with [https://www.moakt.com/ru](https://www.moakt.com/ru))

steps.expected_result: Data is masked by bullet sign in "Desired Password\*" field

steps.action: Fill in "Confirm Password\*" field (enter identical to "Desired Password\*" field data)
steps.expected_result: Data is mascked by bullet sign in "Confirm Password\*" field
User is redirected to the home page

cases.description: Registered users can log in using email and password
